Posts.Title: Found a lump, waiting on U/S results...

Posts.Content: Sorry I can't give you any advice. But i do have a question for you, if you don't mind. Where about is the pain on the left side of the chest? I've had a pain in my left chest muscle, just above my breast off and on. Comes and goes, sometimes I can feel it righ through to my shoulder blade. TIA
Posts.Title: Found a calcified lymph node

Posts.Content: Update: Well her rash went away, but I saw her recently and she does not look well. She was supposed to go get blood tests done and hasn't done so. Was sick for four days last week and chalked it up to be the flu. We'll see. She is a procrastinator when it comes to her health, I think it's going to catch up to her. Deb
Posts.Title: Red patches on breast and underarm

Posts.Content: My older sister called today and said she has about 6 red patches (rash like) on her breast and one under her arm. She also says her breast is very tender. Is this a symptom of breast cancer?
